last_action: click on the search bar located at the top right.
reflect_result: By clicking on the search bar, the cursor is now placed in the search field, allowing you to type in the name of the app you want to uninstall. This is a necessary step because to uninstall the "Lyft - Rideshare, Bikes, Scooters & Transit" app, you first need to search for it in the app store. This action brings you closer to completing your request as it enables you to enter the app's name and proceed with uninstallation.
